name: Shrimp.io
description:
A simple survivor-like where you play as a shrimp, you must kill fishies & other creatures, gather microplastics, and purchase meta upgrades.

Current Meta Upgrades:
  • +5% Move Speed - 4 Levels
  • +10% Max Health - 5 Levels
  • +5% Outgoing Damage - 5 Levels
  • -1 Incoming Damage - 3 Levels

The gameplay is simple, just move, and use the patterns of the auto-firing weapons you have to murder the oncoming swarms of fishies & creatures.

if you have issues with the game or suggestions, make sure to let me know.

have a good day! :D
